mapper.select:
select count(id) from `sizhenganli_info` where ${column} = #{value}
and id != #{id}

select `sizhenganli_info`.* from `sizhenganli_info` where 1 = 1
and `sizhenganli_info`.`biaoti` like concat('%', #{biaoti}, '%')
order by `sizhenganli_info`.id

select `sizhenganli_info`.* from `sizhenganli_info` where 1 = 1
and `sizhenganli_info`.`biaoti` like concat('%', #{biaoti}, '%')
and `sizhenganli_info`.`leibie` like concat('%', #{leibie}, '%')
order by `sizhenganli_info`.id

select `sizhenganli_info`.* from `sizhenganli_info` where 1 = 1
and `sizhenganli_info`.`biaoti` like concat('%', #{biaoti}, '%')
and `sizhenganli_info`.`faburen` like concat('%', #{faburen}, '%')
order by `sizhenganli_info`.id
